survey_name: Electric Vehicle Charging Infrastructure Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from electric vehicle (EV) owners regarding their satisfaction with public and private charging infrastructure, identifying pain points and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of EV charging stations in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of EV charging stations in your area?

questions.question_text: What type of EV charging stations do you most frequently use?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field for additional details.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What type of EV charging stations do you most frequently use?

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face when using public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Allow respondents to select multiple challenges and provide additional context if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face when using public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience issues with EV charging stations not working properly?
answer_options: Very frequently (more than 50% of the time)
questions.client_notes: A frequency scale helps quantify the extent of technical issues.

script.question_text: How often do you experience issues with EV charging stations not working properly?
answer_options: Very frequently (more than 50% of the time)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in EV charging infrastructure?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback and unique suggestions.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in EV charging infrastructure?
